title: Sample, ca. 1942
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary weft
dimensions:
H x W (sample): 17.1 x 15.9 cm (6 3/4 x 6 1/4 in.)
H x W (card): 31.8 x 27.9 cm (12 1/2 in. x 11 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Woven sample mounted to a cardboard card with notations by the designer. Checkerboard pattern in pink and metallic gold. Warp is pale pink cotton. Foundation weft is darker pink bouclé; supplementary weft is paired wrapped gold metallic yarns.
